summary.span: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

span.span: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Um item é um nó ou um valor atômico.An item is either a node or an atomic value.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

value.span: O item atual como um objeto demarcado de mais apropriados [! Tipo de include[dnprdnshort](~/Includes/dnprdnshort-MD.MD)].

span.span: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se o valor do item não é válido de acordo com seu esquema especificada de tipo, o valor da propriedade é equivalente ao valor da propriedade.If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the property is equivalent to the value of the property. Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no namespace, consulte [suporte a tipo nas Classes System. XML](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: The object used to resolve namespace prefixes.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

returns.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

span.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, o método tenta converter o valor do item a ser o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] tipo especificado.When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified. O objeto é usado para resolver os prefixos de namespace relacionados a conversões de tipo.The object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. Por exemplo, ao converter um `xs:QName` para um `xs:string`.For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`. Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no namespace, consulte [suporte a tipo nas Classes System. XML](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, o propriedade obtém o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tipo do valor digitado do item.When overridden in a derived class, the property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item. Por exemplo, um elemento do tipo `xs:int` teria um de por padrão.For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. No entanto, o pode ser qualquer um dos tipos válidos que podem ser mapeados para `xs:int`, como ou .However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no namespace, consulte [suporte a tipo nas Classes System. XML](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

span.para: Todos os implementadores devem fornecer um propriedade para cada item, mesmo se ele é somente .
All implementers must provide a property for every item, even if it is only .
